title: Relative Clauses 4
description: Add the phrase in brackets to the sentence using a relative clause. If it's possible, you should drop the relative pronoun:

parts.value: The doctor was sick (I wanted to see the doctor)

parts.answer: The doctor I wanted to see was sick
answerList: The doctor I wanted to see was sick

parts.value: The accountant was arrested (the accountant works for my father's company)

parts.answer: The accountant that works for my father's company was arrested
answerList: The accountant that works for my father's company was arrested
The accountant who works for my father's company was arrested

parts.value: I wrote to the friend (you met the friend last week)

parts.answer: I wrote to the friend you met last week
answerList: I wrote to the friend you met last week

parts.value: The mobile phone can't be fixed (the mobile phone is broken)

parts.answer: The mobile phone that is broken can't be fixed
answerList: The mobile phone that is broken can't be fixed
The mobile phone which is broken can't be fixed

parts.value: John made a copy of the photo (I took the photo)

parts.answer: John made a copy of the photo I took
answerList: John made a copy of the photo I took

parts.answer: I met a girl that was a doctor
answerList: I met a girl that was a doctor
I met a girl who was a doctor
